law.history: Repealed 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 308, sec. 50, effective April 9, 1996. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 370, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1982. --Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 174, sec. 24. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 303, secs. 51 and 52. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 227, sec. 3. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 161, sec. 7. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2738r-3, 2739-49, 3766b-18.

metadata.lrc-note: (4/9/96). The action taken with respect to this statute by 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 308 was to have become effective April 8, 1996, under Section 51 of that Act. The Act, however, did not become effective until April 9, 1996, when the Governor's signed copy of the Act was filed with the Secretary of State.
